http://s13.postimg.org/t48shmrs5/IMG_20160324_204750.jpg

I remember those knock-off cards. When I was younger I got a set of fake you-gi-of cards with effects such as "your opponent must either yell out the name of a card in his hand, or reveal the next 3 cards in his deck"

The names were also on the same level of silly "super ccyborg mega-missile-shark

Ah Nostalgia.
Maybe I still have some of my old decks lying around somewhere in the attic.

Thanks for giving me really bad ideas this late in the evening.
Don't be silly, that would actually require standing up and leaving the basement.

Don't worry they will tell you every time they use it.....even when the opponent already activated one.

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/yugioh/images/2/2b/SuperQuantalMechKingGreatMagnus-WIRA-EN-ScR-1E.png/revision/latest?cb=20160209123802

……plz get on my level, it only cost me $1000 to get this card, and it won't be banned until the majority of Yugi-oh players buy it because they want to actually win the games they play.

And people think LEAGUE has balancing issues and power creep out the wazoo.

A black card? Holy hell o.O
I've never even seen one of those.

Yu Gi Oh is far more unbalanced than LoL though. I mean there's even a set of cards that automatically win you the game if you draw them.
Imagine if there were 5 random things you could acquire and suddenly the enemy nexus explodes.
Wait, that's just having {{item:3931}} {{item:3124}} in your team which prompts a /ff @ 20 automatically, so nevermind.
